text: Nigba ti won ba so fun won pe: “E gbagbo ninu ohun ti Allahu sokale.” Won a wi pe: “A gbagbo ninu ohun ti won sokale fun wa.” Won si n sai gbagbo ninu ohun t’o wa leyin re, ti o si n fi ohun t’o je ododo rinle nipa eyi t’o wa pelu won. So pe: “Nitori ki ni e fi n pa awon Anabi Allahu teletele ti e ba je onigbagbo ododo
